name: Black Taffeta
description: "Silky, black foliage chicly ruffled as if it was launched from a Parisian fashion house! Large, glossy leaves in perfect proportion to the plant. Great vigor and reliability are a TERRA NOVA� trademark in the world of Heuchera. You've got to see this one in person to fully appreciate its charm and elegance."
